text: Tara ca'ite adhika jalema ke, yake tara palanakartara kalama dbara bojhano haya, atahpara se ta theke mukha phiriye neya ebam tara purbabarti krtakarmasamuha bhule yaya? Ami tadera antarera upara parda rekhe diyechi, yena ta na bojhe ebam tadera kane rayeche badhiratara bojha. Yadi apani taderake satpathera prati da'oyata dena, tabe kakhana'i tara satpathe asabe na.
